chart_description: This chart shows the count of various relation types in the Postgres catalog. Relations refer to database objects such as tables, views, etc.

dimension_descriptions.index: The count of indexes in the catalog.
dimension_descriptions.ordinary_table: The count of ordinary tables in the catalog.
dimension_descriptions.toast_table: The count of TOAST tables (tables used to store large values) in the catalog.
dimension_descriptions.view: The count of views in the catalog.
